snippet: Thirteen international news organizations have written a letter to the armed opposition in Syria asking for assurances that their reporters will not be abducted.
lead_paragraph: Thirteen international news organizations have written a letter to the armed opposition in Syria asking for assurances that their reporters will not be abducted.

headline.main: News Organizations Call On Syrian Rebels to End Kidnappings
